title: My Daily Phrase German: Special Announcement
description: This is a special announcement for listeners of My Daily Phrase German. We've decided to put a hold on the publication of new material because of the delay. We will now launch lesson 31 on Monday 2nd April. By way of bonus material, we'd like to offer you a couple of puzzles which test the language you've covered so far. Apologies for the inconvenience.
content:encoded: This is a special announcement for listeners of My Daily Phrase German. We've decided to put a hold on the publication of new material because of the delay. We will now launch lesson 31 on Monday 2nd April. By way of bonus material, we'd like to offer you a couple of puzzles which test the language you've covered so far. Apologies for the inconvenience.
itunes:subtitle: Special announcement relating to the launch of future materials
